Title: Relates to the banking development district program
Summary: Relates to the banking development district program, such designation shall be valid for 14 years.
LawCode: Amd ยง96-d, Bank L; amd ยง4, Chap 526 of 1998
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law, in relation to the banking development district program; and to amend chapter 526 of the laws of 1998, amending the banking law relating to participation in the banking development districts program, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
